publication.title: Data Structures for Storing Small Sets in the Bitprobe Model
XCo: explicit coordination to prevent network fabric congestion in cloud computing cluster platforms
publication.authors: vijay shankar rajanna,anand jahagirdar,christopher lemoine,kartik gopalan
publication.jconf: IEEE International Symposium on High Performance Distributed Computing
publication.keyword: Cloud Computing;Congestion Management;Data Storage;Gigabit Ethernet;Network Congestion;Network Performance;Traffic Congestion;Virtual Machine;Fibre Channel;layer 2;
publication.abstract: Large cluster-based cloud computing platforms increasingly use commodity Ethernet technologies, such as Gigabit Ethernet, 10GigE, and Fibre Channel over Ethernet (FCoE), for intra-cluster communication. Traffic congestion can become a performance concern in the Ethernet due to consolidation of data, storage, and control traffic over a common layer-2 fabric, as well as consolidation of multiple virtual machines (VMs) over less physical
